position: Product @Dezerv | IIT Kharagpur | Ex- Cars24, Leap Scholar | Entrepreneurship Cell

positions.subtitle: CARS24
positions.description: *Increased revenue by 15 Cr/m by adding an additional payment mode (Cash) for buyers in the used car purchase journey, partnering and integrating with third party deposit machines for financial compliance;*Reduced man-hour requirement by 2640 Hrs/m by automating financial operations and accounting across company* Built a 100% automated C2B business accounting process integrating internal tools and applications with SAP

*Increased revenue by 15 Cr/m by adding an additional payment mode (Cash) for buyers in the used car purchase journey, partnering and integrating with third party deposit machines for financial compliance;
*Reduced man-hour requirement by 2640 Hrs/m by automating financial operations and accounting across company
* Built a 100% automated C2B business accounting process integrating internal tools and applications with SAP

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Executive head for sponsorship, media, and public relations portfolios. Co-led a team of 35 Associate Managers to collaborate with sponsors (LTI, Linkedin, WestBidge capital etc) and media bodies (The Hindu, Business Standard, moneycontrol etc). positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: ⦁	Ideated and organized the Jaipur chapter of the Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive(EAD) 2019. EAD is the flagship event of E-Cell IIT Kharagpur spanning 25 cities with more than 25,000 student participants and inviting premier corporate personalities. Generated a footfall of 1400+ students and collaborated with 6 media partners for EAD Jaipur.
